data.name: Alienstein
data.detailed_description:
Alienstein is a retro inspired FPS where you run and gun through random generated rooms and corridors.

Story 🛸

You have been abducted by aliens that plan to have you as their main course. Luckily for you the aliens are not the sharpest knife in the drawer and you are able to find a gun and escape. Now you need to fight through throngs of aliens and ultimately find your way back to earth.


Key features

  • 🍀 Randomly generated levels provides fresh challenge each time you play
  • 👽 Boss fights
  • 🦸‍♂️ Level up your character with stats and skills
  • 📦 Voxel style graphics
  • 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Local split-screen multiplayer

Disclaimer

Screenshots and videos above is from the alpha version. As the game is further developed they will be replaced to accurately reflect the look of the game

data.short_description: Alienstein is a retro inspired FPS with random generated levels and boss fights 🔫

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Any 1.00 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3110M 2.40 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
